extension.summary: Improved search results for actors and more. Field editor.
extension.description:
An actor/director search engine and metadata editor. See sample DialogVideoInfo.xml file included in Skins folder for how to call.
-Displays search criteria in search results list. -Includes Writer credit in actor/director search results. -List the results chronologically instead of alphabetically. This gives a feel more like IMDb or Wikipedia. -Integrates Movie, TV, and Episode results. See a chronological listing of all an actor's appearances, regardless of the medium (again, similar to IMDb). -Suppress listings for Episodes when the actor already appears in the TV Show. -Display the Role (and/or director/writer) in the results list. -In general, allows skinning of what fields appear in the search. - Sort actors by Order field, or by Name or Role -Also allows for searches in other fields. As seen in sample DialogVideoInfo, can click on Studio to do a Studio search. Can click on genre or year to get a list of all movies/tvshows in that genre for the given year.
As metadata editor: -Edit actor details -Add or delete actor -Edit year, genre, studio, plot (in a tiny box, sorry), etc. -See included sample DialogVideoInfo.xml to see how to call it.
extension.disclaimer: Warnings:#1 Uses direct SQL calls and may require special configuration for non-standard Kodi database. #2 Causes Kodi to crash on rare occasions. See readme file.
